templates.name: Nature's Canvas - Landscaping
templates.description: Free landscaping website template with professional design featuring hero section, service showcase, portfolio gallery, and contact form. Warm earth-tone color palette with responsive Bootstrap 5 design. Perfect for landscaping companies, lawn care services, and outdoor design businesses.

templates.name: Wave Riders - Surf Shop
templates.description: Free surf shop ecommerce template with vibrant ocean-inspired design, product showcase, and surf lesson booking. Built with Tailwind CSS featuring custom gradients and smooth animations. Perfect for surf shops, beach gear retailers, and water sports businesses.

templates.name: Paws & Hearts - Dog Rescue
templates.description: Free dog rescue website template with heartwarming design featuring adoptable pet galleries, adoption process timeline, and success stories. Built with Tailwind CSS using warm earth-tone colors and impactful messaging framework. Perfect for animal shelters, rescue organizations, and pet adoption centers looking to connect dogs with loving families.

templates.name: Ledger & Balance - Bookkeeping
templates.description: Free bookkeeping and accounting website template with professional teal and orange color scheme. Features service breakdown, pricing tables, client testimonials, and contact form. Built with Bootstrap 5.3 and Bootstrap Icons. Perfect for bookkeepers, accountants, tax preparers, and financial services businesses.

templates.name: Sterling & Associates - Law Firm
templates.description: Free law firm website template with professional impactFul messaging framework. Features practice area showcase, client testimonials, 3-step consultation process, and contact form. Built with Tailwind CSS and Lucide Icons featuring elegant coral and teal color palette. Perfect for law firms, attorneys, legal practices, and professional service businesses.

templates.name: ComfortPro - HVAC Services
templates.description: Free HVAC services website template with impactFul messaging framework. Features hero with trust indicators, service breakdown, 3-step process, and contact form with 24/7 emergency callout. Built with Tailwind CSS and Lucide Icons using professional navy and gold color palette. Perfect for HVAC companies, heating and cooling contractors, and home comfort service businesses.

templates.name: Elite Realty - Luxury Real Estate
templates.description: Free luxury real estate website template with stunning parallax effects and animated counters. Features property listings, service showcase, testimonials, and contact form. Built with Tailwind CSS and Font Awesome using elegant navy, cream, and coral color palette. Perfect for real estate agencies, luxury property brokers, and realtors seeking a premium web presence.
